node.name: SlickEdit Core for Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
SlickEdit Core is a subscription plug-in for Eclipse that allows developers to use the popular SlickEdit code editor as the default editor within the Eclipse environment. SlickEdit Core consists of the SlickEdit editor, 8 additional views, and the DIFFzilla differencing engine.

SlickEdit Core works with both Eclipse 3.5 and 3.4 and provides a wide range of advantages for the Eclipse developer including:

• Eclipse Emulation
• System Verilog Language Support
• Vera Language Support
• Code Diff
• Overview Ruler
• D Language Support
• Export and Import Options
• Quick Start Configuration Wizard
• Symbol Coloring
• FTP Client View

“SlickEdit Core v3.5 includes many new features found in SlickEdit 2009 plus features unique to Core, including an Eclipse emulation and an overview ruler for the SlickEdit editor window,” said Scott Westfall, VP of Software Development. “Core's mixture of power, speed, and flexibility allows even the most accomplished developers to write code faster and more accurately − making it an indispensable plug-in for serious programmers.”

Pricing and Availability
SlickEdit Core for Eclipse is available immediately as an annual subscription. Each subscription license is $99 per user per year and includes Maintenance and Support Service. For more information about SlickEdit and free trial downloads, please visit http://www.slickedit.com/products/slickedit-core/slickedit-core SlickEdit Core is a subscription plug-in for Eclipse that allows developers to use the popular SlickEdit code editor as the default editor within the Eclipse environment. • Vera Language Support
• Code Diff
• Overview Ruler
• D Language Support
• Export and Import Options
• Quick Start Configuration Wizard
• Symbol Coloring
• FTP Client View

“SlickEdit Core v3.5 includes many new features found in SlickEdit 2009 plus features unique to Core, including an Eclipse emulation and an overview ruler for the SlickEdit editor window,” said Scott Westfall, VP of Software Development. “Core's mixture of power, speed, and flexibility allows even the most accomplished developers to write code faster and more accurately − making it an indispensable plug-in for serious programmers.”

For more information about SlickEdit and free trial downloads, please visit http://www.slickedit.com/products/slickedit-core/slickedit-core
